title: bhayamEd-ini
sahitya:
bhayamEd-ini paghai Edini paTTAbhirAma bANam irukkaiyil


anupallavi

  tuyar shei asura duSTa kumbalai tuNDu sheyyum kOdaNDapANi tuNai


caraNam    veri piDitta porAmaip-paDaiyin vEdanai keDavE vIra shakti rAman
arivAgi en AtralAgi enrum Aruyirkk-abhayam kOri Inda pinnE
